New Records: Cole Ragans picked up his 200th strikeout of the season, making him the fifth pitcher in Royals history to post 200 strikeouts in a season. He is the first Royals pitcher since Zack Greinke in 2009 to accomplish the feat.
Key Match Events: Cole Ragans scattered four hits in six scoreless innings as the Kansas City Royals defeated the Minnesota Twins 5-0.
Michael Massey had three hits, including a home run, for the Royals.
Hunter Renfroe's single in the fifth inning scored two runs.
Yuli Gurriel’s sacrifice fly in the eighth scored the final run.
